metadata.title: CVE-2021-3530 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: A flaw was discovered in GNU libiberty within demangle_path() in rust-demangle.c, as distributed in GNU Binutils version 2.36. A crafted symbol can cause stack memory to be exhausted leading to a crash.

notes.note: mdeslaur> introduced in 2.36 no fix commited upstream as of 2021-09-27 probably a dupe of CVE-2021-3648

criterions.comment: binutils package in hirsute is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
